text: Poticuara ipiterpe is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Martins and Galileo in 1991. It is known from Costa Rica and Peru.BioLib.cz - Poticuara ipiterpe. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1991
title: Poticuara ipiterpe
